body:
Please Lock This If Needed.

I was just wondering if there was anywhere that I could download the maps from so I could practice on them or learn the layout better.
Thanks!

-Rekt
body_tagged:

title: Avicus Map Downloads

replies.body: There isn't a way to get the downloads of any maps, except you look in the map releases. But make sure to ask the map creator for permissions.
replies.body_tagged: There isn't a way to get the downloads of any maps, except you look in the map releases. But make sure to ask the map creator for permissions.

replies.body: If you want them just for private practice, then download them from the Map Releases section. If you want to use them in a scrim server, you'd wanna ask the original creator for permission.
replies.body_tagged: If you want them just for private practice, then download them from the Map Releases section. If you want to use them in a scrim server, you'd wanna ask the original creator for permission.

replies.body: You can download them from their threads or asking the author for them.
replies.body_tagged: You can download them from their threads or asking the author for them.

replies.body: Later on when there are scrim servers, you can do exactly this for 2 hours a day as long as you have 3 other people to practice with.
replies.body_tagged: Later on when there are scrim servers, you can do exactly this for 2 hours a day as long as you have 3 other people to practice with.
